note.p: Birth: Snargate Street, Dover, Kent, England (01 December 1690)
Death: His house in Grosvenor Square, London (06 March 1764)
Burial: Family vault adjoining the church at Wimpole, Cambridgeshire
Honours: Kt 1720; Baron 1733; Earl of Hardwicke and Viscount Royston 1754
Notes: Technically, he was elected a Fellow as Baron Hardwicke, for he did not become Earl until the following year. However, in R he is entered as Earl of Hardwicke.
